title: State orders radioactive material removed from warehouse
description:
A drum containing radioactive material used in smoke detectors and other equipment was stored at a private company’s warehouse near Santa Fe’s Sweeney Elementary School for years.,

A drum containing radioactive material used in smoke detectors and other equipment was stored at a private company’s warehouse near Santa Fe’s Sweeney Elementary School for years.
